document_data.name: ''Razorlink Chainmail''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Razorlink Chainmail''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[chainmail]], used in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Sets of ''razorlinks'' possessed ''+1'' and ''+2'' defensive enchantments. These armors were interwoven with razorlink improving their defensive capabilities. Additionally, ''razorlink chainmail'' made punishment dealt to those already heavily hurt more severe.''Razorlink chainmail'' could only be worn by [[fighter]]s and [[celric]]s.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, ''razorlink chainmail'' could be found worn by [[orc]]s of the [[Sword Mountains]], and sold in the Mercenary Arms Depot of the city of [[Neverwinter]], as well as recovered from the ruins of [[Illefarn]].
